name: as
signature: { <B>(value: B): <A, E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<B, E, R>; <A, E, R, B>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, value: B): Stream<B, E, R>; }
description: Maps the success values of this stream to the specified constant value.
